channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 秘鲁总理阿尔贝托-奥塔罗拉（Alberto Otarola）周二晚间辞职，据其 X 账户上的帖子称，此前有报道称他与一名获得政府合同的女性有恋爱关系。
item.description:
Peru Prime Minister Alberto Otarola resigned Tuesday evening, according to a post on his X account, after it was reported he had a romantic relationship with a woman who obtained government contracts https://t.co/j7aCfPc7vy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）集团同意延长减产后，沙特阿拉伯提高了下个月向亚洲买家提供的主要石油等级的价格
item.description:
Saudi Arabia increased prices of its main oil grade to buyers in Asia next month after the OPEC+ group agreed to extend output cuts https://t.co/RPmtOwT9a6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会裁减了约 10% 的香港员工
item.description:
Canada Pension Plan Investment Board has eliminated about 10% of its Hong Kong staff https://t.co/9soApzVlze

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 首席经济学家保罗-康威（Paul Conway）表示，如果美联储在今年晚些时候开始放松政策，新西兰央行可能会比目前预期的更早开始降息。
item.description:
New Zealand’s central bank may be able to start cutting interest rates sooner than it currently expects to if the Fed begins easing later this year, chief economist Paul Conway said https://t.co/7FR6jsvSLE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度卢比在今年头两个月的表现优于所有新兴市场同类货币
item.description:
The Indian rupee outperformed all its emerging market peers in the first two months of the year https://t.co/53MV6jcjgM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一家激进基金已成为日本青空银行（Aozora Bank）的最大股东，而青空银行是日本蓝筹股中股价缩水最严重的股票，这使该基金与投机者形成了鲜明对比
item.description:
An activist fund has become the biggest shareholder in Japan’s Aozora Bank, the most-shorted stock on the country’s blue-chip gauge, pitting it against speculators https://t.co/4K08be5wgH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 受美国降息预期提振，黄金在飙升至历史新高后趋于稳定
item.description:
Gold steadied after surging to a record high, boosted by expectations for US rate cuts https://t.co/PvCvx014z0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新消息：随着私营保险公司撤出美国最易发生野火和飓风的市场，"最后手段 "州立房屋保险计划正在吸收数万亿美元的风险。阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: “Last resort” state home insurance programs are absorbing trillions of dollars in risk as private insurers pull out of the US markets most prone to wildfires and hurricanes.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/OXYUVV4sq6

item.title: 星展集团削减了首席执行官 Piyush Gupta 的浮动薪酬部分，因为该银行的数字服务受到干扰，今年的业绩创下新高
item.description:
DBS cut CEO Piyush Gupta’s variable pay components in a record year marred by disruptions in the bank’s digital services https://t.co/VFGl2Ywl8L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 由于高利率和生活成本上涨拖累了家庭支出，澳大利亚经济在去年最后三个月有所放缓
item.description:
Australia’s economy slowed in the final three months of last year as elevated interest rates and rising living costs dragged on household spending https://t.co/Bx3Ix7L63Q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据《海峡时报》报道，面临腐败指控的新加坡前交通部长伊斯瓦兰（S. Iswaran）在墨尔本住院治疗后出院。
item.description:
Singapore’s former transport minister S. Iswaran, who is facing corruption charges, was hospitalized in Melbourne and discharged, the Straits Times reported https://t.co/n0tSm2z6mT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 2024 @卡塔尔经济论坛将于 5 月 14 日至 16 日在多哈举行。请关注本空间即将发布的演讲者公告、分组讨论信息以及围绕社论主题的详细信息。#卡塔尔经济论坛#منتدى_قطر_الاقتصاديRequest请点击这里获取邀请函！

item.title: 比特币周二短暂突破 69,000 美元，超过了 2021 年底达到的历史峰值，令机构和散户投资者为之振奋。
item.description:
Bitcoin briefly topped $69,000 on Tuesday, surpassing the all-time peak it achieved in late 2021 and energizing institutional and retail investors alike https://t.co/2YxADp6WU0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 逃犯 "加密皇后 "鲁贾-伊格纳托娃（Ruja Ignatova）的哥哥在承认帮助运营 OneCoin 骗局后，将不再身陷囹圄。

item.title: 新 ETF 的需求帮助比特币创下历史新高，但许多财务顾问仍不得向客户推荐这些基金
item.description:
Demand from new ETFs helped send Bitcoin to a record, yet many financial advisers still aren't allowed to recommend the funds to clients https://t.co/L92e2Dw2Gf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: Capital One 的一位高管表示，投资者普遍对公司收购 Discover 的计划持积极态度，他们的问题主要集中在交易批准前的监管障碍上。
item.description:
A Capital One executive said investors have generally been positive about the company’s plans to acquire Discover, focusing their questions primarily on the regulatory hurdles ahead of the deal’s approval. https://t.co/W9bcHnJgXI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的公共养老基金在经历了长期的回报低迷和领导层变动之后，正在从外部物色下一任首席信息官。
item.description:
The largest US public pension fund is looking externally for its next CIO, following a long spell of lackluster returns and leadership churn https://t.co/VR0xQ1YlIE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 官员称，海地陷入困境的总理周二在波多黎各登陆，他试图返回海地平息激增的帮派暴力袭击事件（via AP）
item.description:
Haiti’s embattled prime minister landed in Puerto Rico on Tuesday as he tried to return to Haiti to quell a surge in violent gang attacks, officials said (via AP) https://t.co/BSGkNcgzTG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向国会作证之前，交易员们浏览了大部分糟糕的经济数据，导致美国股市下跌
item.description:
US stocks fell as traders waded through mostly poor economic data ahead of Jerome Powell’s testimony to Congress https://t.co/ZwKpBwT3mL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表证词之前，交易员们浏览了大部分糟糕的经济数据，受科技股拖累，美国股市回落
item.description:
US stocks retreated, dragged down by tech, as traders waded through mostly poor economic data before Jerome Powell’s testimony https://t.co/XXs2kmCc7i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024
